Uses of Class
nzilbb.ag.Schema

  • Packages that use Schema 
    Package Description
    nzilbb.ag
    Implementation of an Annotation Graph API for linguistic annotations.
    nzilbb.ag.automation
    These are classes and interfaces for supporting automated annotation modules.
    nzilbb.ag.serialize
    Contains interfaces that are required to convert too/from specific file formats.
    nzilbb.ag.serialize.json
    Annotation Graph serializer/deserializer for JSON.
    nzilbb.ag.serialize.util
    Utility classes used during format conversion.
    nzilbb.ag.util
    Utility classes for processing annotation graphs.

    • Uses of Schema in nzilbb.ag

      Methods in nzilbb.ag that return Schema 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Schema Schema.copyLayerIdsFrom​(Schema source)
      Copies the IDs of the special layers identified by the given schema.
      Schema Graph.getSchema()
      Getter for Graph.schema: The layer definitions and their interrelations.
      Schema GraphStoreQuery.getSchema()
      Gets the layer schema.
      Schema Schema.setCorpusLayerId​(String newCorpusLayerId)
      Setter for corpusLayerId: ID of the layer that tags the graph with its corpus name, if any.
      Schema Schema.setEpisodeLayerId​(String newEpisodeLayerId)
      Setter for episodeLayerId: ID of the layer that tags the graph with its episode name, if any.
      Schema Schema.setLayers​(LinkedHashMap<String,​Layer> newLayers)
      Setter for layers: Layers, indexed by ID.
      Schema Schema.setParticipantLayerId​(String newParticipantLayerId)
      Setter for participantLayerId: ID of the layer that contains participants.
      Schema Schema.setTurnLayerId​(String newTurnLayerId)
      Setter for turnLayerId: ID of the layer that contains speaker turns.
      Schema Schema.setUtteranceLayerId​(String newUtteranceLayerId)
      Setter for utteranceLayerId: ID of the layer that contains speaker utterances.
      Schema Schema.setWordLayerId​(String newWordLayerId)
      Setter for wordLayerId: ID of the layer that contains individual word tokens.
      Methods in nzilbb.ag with parameters of type Schema 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Schema Schema.copyLayerIdsFrom​(Schema source)
      Copies the IDs of the special layers identified by the given schema.
      Graph Graph.setSchema​(Schema newSchema)
      Setter for Graph.schema.

    • Uses of Schema in nzilbb.ag.serialize.util

      Methods in nzilbb.ag.serialize.util with parameters of type Schema 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static File ConfigurationHelper.LoadConfiguration​(SerializationDescriptor descriptor, ParameterSet configuration, File directory, Schema schema)
      Loads configuration for a (de)serializer from an XML file, whose path is determined by the given descriptor and the given directory.
      static ParameterSet ConfigurationHelper.LoadParameters​(Map<String,​String[]> map, String keyPrefix, ParameterSet parameters, Schema schema)
      Loads a (de)serialization configuratation from the given parameter map (most likely from a servlet request) the icon file for the given descriptor has been extracted to the given directory.
